ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class PageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.PageController

  • public class PageController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for methods only affecting the page part of a model. This generally takes care of any interaction of the user with the program that affect a single page in the model.
    Author:
    James Cadek, James Moore

      • finishedUpdating

        public void finishedUpdating()
        Lets the controller know that the view has finished updating by setting the *Changed variables back to false.

      • setTilesChanged

        public void setTilesChanged()
        Sets the tilesChanged mark to true so that the ViewPageActivity will know that the tiles need to be updated, and then tells the ViewPageActivity to update.

      • haveTilesChanged

        public boolean haveTilesChanged()
        Get whether the tiles list has changed since the last update.
        Returns:
        Returns whether tiles have changed.

      • setDecisionsChanged

        public void setDecisionsChanged()
        Sets decisionsChanged to true so that the ViewPageActivity will know that the decisions need to be updated, and then tells the ViewPageActivity to update.

      • haveDecisionsChanged

        public boolean haveDecisionsChanged()
        Get whether the decisions list has changed since the last update/
        Returns:
        Returns whether the decisions have changed.

      • setCommentsChanged

        Sets commentsChanged to true so the ViewPageActivity will know to update the comments, and then tells ViewPageActivity to update.

        public void reloadPage()
        Sets all the changed variables to true and then tells ViewPageActivity to update. Basically it tells ViewPageActivity to refresh the whole view.
